General.Name: Beijing Fengshangshiji Culture Medi
General.Description: Funshine Culture Group Co., Ltd. engages in cultural performing events and public artistic lighting in China. The company offers opening and closing ceremonies of large-scale sports events, celebrations or commemorative activities, television gala, corporate brand cultural activities, lighting design, and production services. It also provides cultural tourism performance activities such as live tourism performance, theme park tourism performance, and theater performance tourism performance, etc. In addition, the company offers landscape and architectural artistic lighting design, light shows, and lighting design and production. The company was formerly known as Beijing Funshine Culture Media Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Funshine Culture Group Co., Ltd. in March 2023. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No.11, Dongzhimen South Street, Beijing, China, 100007
